self.name: codeSettings
self.description: Settings used by telegram servers for sending the confirm code.
self.descriptionExcerpt: Settings used by telegram servers for sending the confirm code.

arguments.name: allowFlashcall
arguments.description: Whether to allow phone verification via phone calls.

arguments.name: currentNumber
arguments.description: Pass true if the phone number is used on the current device. Ignored if allow_flashcall is not set.

arguments.name: allowAppHash
arguments.description: If a token that will be included in eventually sent SMSs is required: required in newer versions of android, to use the android SMS receiver APIs

parent.name: CodeSettings
parent.description: Settings for the code type to send
